live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.

43325.summary: Some customers in the Rossmere and East Kildonan area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43325.title: Oct 24– Winnipeg ( Rossmere and East Kildonan) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
